description: When running a Django web application, a NameError is thrown stating that the variable 'django_app_name' is not defined. This error occurs when the web application is trying to use the variable to access a particular application, but the variable has not been declared or assigned a value
output:
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
NameError: name 'django_app_name' is not defined
